title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Offering constructive advice to a friend seems like an act of kindness today. But you might be surprised when unsolicited criticism is aimed back at you. Fortunately, your positive attitude can set the stage for growth, so receive the feedback with an eye toward improving the future. What sounds like negativity at first actually sets your mind at ease as this new perspective empowers you to overcome an obstacle. Move past your initial resistance and be thankful for an ally who is truly on your side. Honesty is a sign of respect. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
